item.title: MacBook as an ephemeral device
item.description: Bootstrap and configure a MacBook Even my MacBook is becoming more and more ephemeral. Years ago I spent hours to get started on a new hardware. Nowadays I want it to be done quick and reproducible. And the less dependencies the better. So ask yourself if your MacBook does survive the 10th floor test: “Can I grab a random machine and throw it out the tenth-floor window without adversely impacting users for more than 10 minutes?
